name: Logik
overview: Published in Schatztruhe #1215. Logik is a great thinking and combination game for the whole family. You have to try to recreate a heap of diamonds according to certain rules of the game, which must match the original both in shape and colour. On each level you also play against the clock and have to try to solve the puzzle as quickly as possible. Logik also has an undo function that can be used to correct incorrect moves.
